Text.Page:
Unbelievable!

I’m so busy, I don’t even have time to drink a flask of water. And here you are wandering around town with nothing to do!"That's me."
{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} needs help, as usual. She's on my last nerve, I tell you.

Thank the gods I don't trust that you're here. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}'s ready to kill me!

I'm supposed to keep track of all the materials we need for our work, and that's not even counting our general merchant supply. Hunt down the supplies, and deliver things all over town. Her expectations are ridiculous!

You’re pretty good at tracking down materials. Velika could use a few more like you.

Give {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} my thanks.
Why are you here? Is something wrong?

Thank you kindly, .

The Hands of Velika do extraordinary work. Tell {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} I said thank you.
You here to craft? Wait, you're the one who's bringing me the supplies from Taratia, yes?
